text: Danny S. Toala (born 23 March 1999 in New Zealand) is a New Zealand rugby union player, who currently plays as a midfield back or fullback for the in Super Rugby and in New Zealand's domestic Mitre 10 Cup competition. He made his debut for the Hurricanes in round 17 of the 2019 season against the . ==Reference list== ==External links== *itsrugby.co.uk profile *Hawke's Bay profile Category:1999 births Category:New Zealand rugby union players Category:Living people Category:Rugby union fullbacks
